title: Child of the Altar

acts.name: The Mark
beats: Witness a Breath-touched child seized by radicals
Discover a hidden Va-Pylon beneath the fish market
Choose an ally: Crusader captain or Confessor abbot

acts.name: Three Altars
beats: Locate two more sacrifice sites in the slums
Decide: sabotage, save, or subvert the rites
Face an Echelon scout ring stealing children
outcomes: Save ≥2 children → unlock Mercy Rite; else radicals escalate

acts.name: The Storm Breaks
beats: Veil-Storm clock hits 6; riftlings pour in
Perform Mercy Rite (3-step DC) or stop the sacrifice
Optional: retune pylons to reveal an Eldran vault
endings: Mercy: storm ends; city spared blood-guilt
Sacrifice: storm ends; permanent stigma; Breath boons weaken locally
Aperture: storm births a gate; rare loot; lasting taint

rewards: Relic: Tear of Abel (one-use Breath purge)
Map Fragment: Eldran vault entrance (if retuned)
